summary: So this has probably been said before but
body:
So this has probably been said before but

The Traveler isn’t a God, or at least not yet. I think he’s on a similar, if maybe less destructive, journey as Vecna. Like he’s obviously been building his following, and he’s definitely been around for a while, if the iconography they found in the Morrow cave is any indication, but his ability to be so present on the prime plane clearly shows that he’s not locked behind the celestial gate, meaning he wasn’t sealed away like the rest of the gods. As such I think this whole “TravelerCon” is going to be his “proof of power”.

On the other hand, if The Traveler is Artagan like so many other theories it possible he was already a God. I know we all believed that Artagan was was an ArchFey, but for some reason he couldn’t leave the feywilds. In fact, he had to ask for a specially built DOOR for him to TRAVEL over…(insert footnote)… it was like he was locked behind something. A Celetial Gate maybe?

Alternatively from Traveler Artagan is that he is just an ArchFey and it trying to follow in the footsteps of the Raven Queen and Vecna.

…I think I’ve convinced myself of this, but I still like all of these…

summary: and they were still roommates (oh my god they were still roommates) [id: a sepia-toned digital sketch of beau and jester from...
caption:
and they were still roommates (oh my god they were still roommates)

[id: a sepia-toned digital sketch of beau and jester from critical role. they are shown from the shoulders up in profile, laying in a bed and facing each other. jester is a tiefling with wavy dark shoulder-length hair and ram-like horns. she is smiling widely with her eyes closed as she cups beau’s face in her hands. beau is a brown-skinned human woman with dark brown hair that is shaved on the side and back. she is also smiling with her eyes closed. end id]

summary: Okay so I know Matt can't play instruments but can you imagine the adorable mental image that is Matt playing ukelele
question: Okay so I know Matt can't play instruments but can you imagine the adorable mental image that is Matt playing ukelele
answer: I KNOW RIGHT I wonder if his dad taught him anything? But you said he doesn’t know so I guess not but now I just wanna see a cheesy CR gang band get together like in the hanna barbara cartoons lol. Laura and Ashley as the singers, Marisha and Matt on Guitars, Sam on Keyboard, Liam on Bass, Travis on Drums, Taliesin can do whatever he wants, maybe the cheesy simple instruments like the tambourine, triangle or chimes, then again that might be more Sam’s style and he and Sam could switch.

summary: anyways it took me over a month to watch the kraken episode and still couldn't sit through the last twenty minutes and had to...
body: anyways it took me over a month to watch the kraken episode and still couldn’t sit through the last twenty minutes and had to skip to the next episode and this is of course an old issue but Y'all Need To Be Nice To People. this just in the cast aren’t robots they’re humans who make mistake when put on the spot and freaking out in a high stakes fight after a day of doing Other Adult Job Things. they don’t have to stream this show for us, and just because you think you can do it better doesn’t mean you get to be an ass over it. empathy is better than arrogance

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: Heard "Unstoppable" by The Score and immediately thought of the Mighty Nein. It also works for VM, but I think it works for each...
question: Heard "Unstoppable" by The Score and immediately thought of the Mighty Nein. It also works for VM, but I think it works for each group in different ways.
answer:
YES I think it’s great for them both realizing they can be heroes in helping people and saying “fuck you” to the people who have kept them down:

“We can be heroes everywhere we go/ 
We can have all that we ever want”

and 

“Everybody who gave up/ 
Is just the fuel for/ 
Wanting it more/ 
Than anybody against us” 

For Vox Machina, I think it works just for their cohesiveness — I can see them prepping for the Thordak battle to:

“There’s a moment/ 
In your bones when/ 
When the fire takes over/ 
Blood is running/ 
Heart is pumping/ 
As the battle gets closer” 

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: "i will follow you in the dark" (im partial to the cover by daniela andrade) came up on my spotify after the vex playlist and i...
question: "i will follow you in the dark" (im partial to the cover by daniela andrade) came up on my spotify after the vex playlist and i was thinking about how it's a very good song for both of the twins. i only just got up to the feywild miniarc but it got me thinking about how unwelcomed they felt with the other elves and went on their own paths for a while. and some of the lines really got me about how ride or die (especially die) they are for each other
answer:
Oh gosh, what a lovely cover. I definitely see what you mean about the lyrics. This really reminds me of their schooling in Syngorn:

“In Catholic school, as vicious as Roman rule/ 
I got my knuckles bruised by a lady in black” 

While this reminds me of their escape and travels together:

“You and me have seen everything to see/ 
From Bangkok to Calgary/ 
And the soles of your shoes are all worn down” 

And oh gosh, isn’t this just perfect for the Sunken Tomb? I can see Vax holding Vex so tightly as he gives himself to the Raven Queen and hopes beyond hope that she’ll come back:

“Someday you will die/ 
But I’ll be close behind/ 
I’ll follow you into the dark […] 
Just our hands clasped so tight/ 
Waiting for the hint of a spark”

(I hope your c1 watch is going well!!)

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

“Someday you will die/ 
But I’ll be close behind/ 
I’ll follow you into the dark […] 
Just our hands clasped so tight/ 
Waiting for the hint of a spark”

(I hope your c1 watch is going well!!)

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)
trail.content:
Oh gosh, what a lovely cover. I definitely see what you mean about the lyrics. This really reminds me of their schooling in Syngorn:

“In Catholic school, as vicious as Roman rule/ 
I got my knuckles bruised by a lady in black” 

While this reminds me of their escape and travels together:

“You and me have seen everything to see/ 
From Bangkok to Calgary/ 
And the soles of your shoes are all worn down” 

And oh gosh, isn’t this just perfect for the Sunken Tomb? I can see Vax holding Vex so tightly as he gives himself to the Raven Queen and hopes beyond hope that she’ll come back:

“Someday you will die/ 
But I’ll be close behind/ 
I’ll follow you into the dark […] 
Just our hands clasped so tight/ 
Waiting for the hint of a spark”

(I hope your c1 watch is going well!!)
